verses.text: Ach wuninal, cha ab' in jelanil tik, scham wal a maclan ab' in razón wach' swala'.
Icha chi' ol aj snachajel uuj, ol yal a lolon yet' jelanil.
Ha junok ix ix ay yetb'eyum, te wach' slolon ix, k'ununi slolon ix yic tzach smontejb'at ix t'a chukal.
Axo t'a slajwub'al, lajanxo tz'aj ix icha anh ixaj te k'a', icha wal tz'aj ko lajwi yuj k'een espada chab' ye.
Ha mach sb'eyek' yet' jun ix ix chi', ol chamoc. Ha sb'eyb'al jun ix ix chi', b'eal chamel yaji.
Ha t'a ix chi' malaj yelk'och sb'eal k 'inal, max snalaj ix tato wach', mato chuk sb'eyb'al ix chi'.
Yuj chi' ach wuninal, ab' tas swala'. Manh ik'kanel a b'ha t'a a kachnab'il swak' tik.
Najat tzach el t'a stz'ey ix ay yetb'eyum chi', xach k'ochta wal t'a spuertail spat ix.
Tato maay, ol satel a b'inaj t'a wach'il, elanhchamel ol ach cham yuj junok winh malaj yok'elk'olal.
Tato icha chi' tza k'ulej, jantacnhej a b'eyumal ix ilchaj uuj ayic ix ak'an wal ip a munlaji, ol ak'kanb'at t'a yol sk'ab' junok ch'oc animail.
Tato tza k'anab'ajej tas syal ix, toxonhej ol ach ok'kanek'oc, jab'jab'il ol lajwoquem a niwanil.
Axo ol alan icha tik: ¿Tas wal yuj ix in patiquejel in kachnab'il? ¿Tas wal yuj maj in k'anab'ajej?
Maj yal in k'ool ix in cha wab' tas ix yal heb' in k'ayb'umal, octom ix in cha wab' t'a heb'.
Axo ticnaik jab'xonhej maj in juwiel t'a yichanh masanil chonhab' t'a junelnhej, xa chama.
Uk' ha ha' ictaxon yaji yic wach' tzek' stak'inhal a ti'. (Syalelk'ochi anhej yet' ix etb'eyum tzak' a gana.)
¿Tas wal yuj ol aj uninal yet' heb' ix ix tzek' t'a yoltac calle?
Wach' skolwaj heb' uninal ed'oc, t'a yichanh junocxo mach b'aj skolwaj heb' uninal chi'.
Tzalajanh, ayokab' uninal yet' ix etb'eyum chi', aton ix, ix ik' a b'a yet'oc ayic quelem achto.
Wach'okab' yilji ix t'a yol a sat, icha wal junok nok' k'ultaquil chej. Mokab' lajwoc a tzalajk'olal t'a ix, ayokab' a tzalajk'olal chi' yujto xajan ach yuj ix.
Ach wuninal, manh ak' somchajel a pensar yuj junok ix ix ayxo yetb'eyum. ¿Tas yuj ol ach och chelchel t'a junxo ix ix chi'?
Ha Jehová wan ton yilan ko b'eyb'al junjun onh, malaj junok tas max uji yilani.
Ha heb' chuk, anheja' schukal heb' chi' ol ak'an juwoqueloc. Anheja' schukal heb' chi' ol tzek'anoc, icha ko tzek'ji t'a junok lasu.
Yujto max syamoch waan sb'a heb', yuj chi' ol b'atkan heb' t'a chamel. Yuj smanh pensaril heb' chi', ol satkanel heb'.
